direct_enhancements.method_name: remove(List<? extends T>, List<? extends T>)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate lists by adding or removing elements, sharing similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods involve list manipulation with similar control flows and exception handling, though they perform different operations (adding vs. replacing elements).
Both methods access and manipulate collections of elements, though they operate on different types of data (generic lists vs. geometric items).
